content: A White woman talking about the perpetual violence of White women (the reason I wasn’t at any of those goddamn Women’s Marches across the country). Best thing I’ve read all day. Your friend is right: we talk about it ALL THE TIME b/c it affects us all the time. Good piece. Great examples. I wrote a whole piece on Save the Last Dance because the Black women were vilified although Sarah was a colonizer. They were just protecting their home from a historically known abuser. Good job.
